amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 109-461 to authorize the Army and the National Guard Bureau to contract with a United States contractor to perform the RESET of the CH-47 helicopters assigned to the Nevada and Oregon National Guard in order to reduce the non-operational rate of their CH-47 fleet.

action.text: Hooley amendment (A015) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Hooley amendment (A015) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
